verbose_text: The eight-fold increase in the mucA- mutants ' AMP concentration could have led to the direct conversion of FBP to DHAP and GAP by FBP aldolase (EC 4.1.2.13) in the mucA- DeltaalgC strain, but that was not observed in the current fluxome study.
evidence: led to the direct conversion of FBP to DHAP and GAP by FBP aldolase
